metadata.title: CVE-2022-40898 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue discovered in Python Packaging Authority (PyPA) Wheel 0.37.1 andearlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via attackercontrolled input to wheel cli.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-40898` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-wheel-common - 0.34.2-1ubuntu0.1
python3-wheel - 0.34.2-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

python-pip-whl - 20.0.2-5ubuntu1.8
python3-pip - 20.0.2-5ubuntu1.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wheel package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.34.2-1ubuntu0.1').
python-pip package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20.0.2-5ubuntu1.8').
